title: Cover
medium: Technique: 7&1 satin foundation (silk); embroidery using half cross stitches; lined in plain weave silk
dimensions: Height: 56.5 cm(22 1/4 inches) by width: 80.5cm (31 3/4 in)
description: Floral shapes, each embroidered twice in a different color scheme along the borders of a cover. A two inch metallic fringe attached to all sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover.
Technique: 7&1 satin foundation (silk); embroidery using half cross stitches; lined in plain weave silk. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-54.
